full_text:
Patriots will be meeting with Alabama WR John Metchie this week.

One of Mac Jones college WR.

Late to report this but, Patriots 7 Yr Free Agent Special Teamer Brandon King has reached an agreement on a 1 year deal with the #Colts .

Patriots lose a leader and good player in king.
Patriots will host Round 1 Projected Cornerback Andrew Booth Friday April 8th for a draft visit.
